TO: Network Acceptance Subcommittee

Subject: Tales of the Valiant, New World of Atomic Energy,
Vestas of Israel, and Colombo Plan P^nel.
(1) Tales of the Valiant ... yes*
(2) New World of Atomic Energy...yes.
(3) Vistas of Israel ,yes.
(V) Colombo Plan Panel ... no.
Will send my vote on "Grant in Aid" series within
the next few days.
Sincerely
Edward J. Slack, Member
Network Acceptance Subcommittee
